# Restore Soul's Treasure (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[Sanctified Spells|Sanctified 8]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 16th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 16]], [[BoXM 16th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 16]], [[BoXM 16th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 16]]

**Casting Time:** 1 round

**Components:** Sacrifice

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** Disintegrated remains of one item

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Book of Exalted Deeds (WotC)­, pg. 105

If the target of this spell has lost a valuable item as the result of the spell *[[Soul's Treasure Lost (Spell)|soul’s treasure lost]]*, this spell restores that item. This spell must be cast within 4 hours of the destruction of the item. Upon completion of the casting, the disintegrated item returns to the possession of the original owner in the condition it was in before being disintegrated.

*Sacrifice:* 1d4 points of Constitution drain.
